description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dtpk0","text":"Protocol (both increased sediment amount up to 2.0g as well as concentrating DNA post-extraction) unsuccessful at detecting fish sedDNA from lakes in Maine, USA. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rlgp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ndsg","text":"Both protocols successful at detecting fish sedDNA collected in streams during anadromous fish sea-run migrations","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info:
Protocol successful at detecting fish sedDNA collected in a stream during a fish migration

Protocol unsuccessful at detecting fish sedDNA from Maine lakes
